name: Naija Grill House
description: A vibrant spot for suya, grilled fish, and classic Nigerian barbecue.

name: Bukka Republic
description: Authentic Nigerian home-cooked meals, amala, efo riro, and more.

name: Jollof City
description: The best jollof rice, fried rice, and party platters in Lagos.

name: Palmwine Place
description: Chill spot for palm wine, nkwobi, and Nigerian small chops.

name: Pepper Soup Spot
description: Spicy catfish, goat meat pepper soup, and Nigerian drinks.

name: Chop Life Lounge
description: Trendy lounge for Nigerian snacks, cocktails, and live music.

name: Ofada Kitchen
description: Specialist in ofada rice, ayamase, and Nigerian local delicacies.
